strings.SS2_CYBORG2_PRIMARY_LASTPRISM_DESCRIPTIO: Charge up a continuous laser that deals <style=cIsDamage>200-1000% damage</style> per second, but has <style=cIsHealth>decreased turning speed.
strings.SS2_CYBORG2_SECONDARY_LASER_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsDamage>Stunning.</style> Fire laser blasts at up to <style=cIsDamage>3</style> targets for <style=cIsDamage>3x300% damage</style>.
strings.SS2_CYBORG2_SECONDARY_MINES_DESCRIPTION: Place a mine that repeatedly <style=cIsDamage>shocks</style> and <style=cIsDamage>primes</style> nearby targets. Can place up to 3.
strings.SS2_CYBORG2_UTILITY_TELEPORTER_DESCRIPTI: Throw out a <style=cIsUtility>warp point</style>. After 2 seconds, <style=cIsUtility>warp</style> to its location, dealing <style=cIsDamage>300% damage</style> and <style=cIsDamage>priming</style> targets along the path.
strings.SS2_CYBORG2_UTILITY_TRAP_DESCRIPTION: Throw out a device that <style=cIsDamage>captures</style> low health CONTENDERS, granting <style=cIsUtility>money</style> and <style=cIsUtility>elite aspects</style> to nearby TEAMMATES.
strings.SS2_CYBORG2_SPECIAL_MAGNETBALL_DESCRIPTI: Fire a magnetic mass that <style=cIsUtility>pulls</style> nearby CONTENDERS, then explodes for <style=cIsDamage>400% damage</style>.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_CYBORG2_MASTERY_DESC: As Cyborg, beat the game or obliterate on Monsoon or harder.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_CYBORG2_GRANDMASTERY_DES: As Cyborg, beat the game or obliterate on Typhoon.
